contents.text: Welcome to Saba Software in the East Bay, where our talent platform seamlessly connects skills with learning, performance, succession, and talent management.
Press 1 for Sales and Product Information.
Press 1 for a product demonstration of our connected talent platform.
Please hold while we transfer you to our demo specialists.

navigationGoals: Schedule a walkthrough of the talent platform to evaluate its features for our team.
I’d like to schedule a demo of the talent platform to see how it can support veteran programs.
Schedule a live demo showcasing the platform’s API integrations and analytics dashboard.
I’d like someone to walk me through a demonstration of the talent platform features
I’d like to see a live demo of how your platform tracks and visualizes skills and learning progress for a student project.

contents.text: Press 2 to inquire about pricing and licensing options.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: Obtain a detailed breakdown of subscription costs and license tiers for budgeting.
I’m looking for pricing and licensing details, including any discounts available to veterans.
Get detailed licensing tiers, subscription models, and user-seat pricing for the platform.
I need information on subscription pricing and available license options
I need information on academic licensing fees and discounts for using your talent platform at my university.

contents.text: Press 2 for Customer Support and Services.
Press 1 for technical support with Saba Platform issues.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my dashboard access issue on the Saba Platform.
I need technical support—I’m a veteran user and can’t access parts of the Saba platform.
Troubleshoot an OAuth authentication error I’m seeing in the Saba Platform API.
I’m having trouble logging in and need help resetting my password
I’m having trouble logging into the Saba platform and need technical assistance to resolve the error.

contents.text: Press 2 for account and billing inquiries.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review my most recent invoice and confirm the charges applied.
I have questions about my account billing and invoices.
Review my enterprise invoice breakdown and update the payment method on file.
I want to review my latest bill and clarify the charges
Can you help me understand and get a copy of the billing statement for my recent course subscription?
